entities.name: vo ldemort
entities.description: The name of the person mentioned in the text is Vo ldemort. The text states that Harry hiccuped at the sound of Vo ldemort's name.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who survived as a baby and is being talked to by Cho in the text.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a person who is talking to Harry and getting upset about mentioning Cedric.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a person mentioned in the text as someone who died.

relationships.description: Harry reacted to hearing Vo ldemort's name.
Cho mentioned Cedric, which made Harry upset.
Harry was interacting with Cho and trying to comfort her.
Cho apologized to Harry for getting upset.
